desc.p: This user definable rule will be used to evaluate if the client fits into the profile. This uses the generic rule engine built as the part of PW enhancement.
: Input must have an existing code on PW.TRANSITION table
Stores the type of profile that can be assigned to the client. This specifies that the current profile is allowed for this profile type.
: Input must have an existing code on CR.PROFILE.TYPE table
Specifies the description of the profile .
: Mandatory input. Maximum of 35 characters allowed. Alphanumeric.
Decides the order in which profile record should be assigned to the customer. This field has the impact when multiple profiles match for single profile type.
: Input must be numeric. Mandatory input.Maximum of 2 characters allowed.
